definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Across the highway, water wells concubines heart.
sentences.chinese: 波澜誓不起，妾心井中水。

sentences.english: Finally, an economic evaluation of the reclaimed-water recycling plant is made.
sentences.chinese: 最后，对该中水处理系统做了简要的经济评估。

sentences.english: A new method to determine insoluble substance in raw salt is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种测定原盐中水不溶物含量的新方法。
常汲井中水最甜，脑越用越灵。

sentences.english: In addition, suggestions for middle-water recycling were offered.
sentences.chinese: 最后对中水回用提出了建议。

sentences.english: Turn the bottle on the normal position, the water will be automatically outflow until keeping balance.
sentences.chinese: 翻转饮水器至一般地位，瓶中水主动流出抵达均衡处。

sentences.english: Is there a simpler way to capture and use gray water?
sentences.chinese: 有没有更简单的中水回用办法呢？

sentences.english: Check the fluid levels in your car.
sentences.chinese: 检查一下车中水和油的液面。

sentences.english: Normal water retrieval and utilization is one of the effectives way of solving the crisis of water resource of our country.
sentences.chinese: 中水回用是解决我国水资源危机的有效途径之一。

sentences.english: Back underground, Michael and Sucre hear the water stop flowing.
sentences.chinese: 在地下道，迈可和苏克雷听到了管道中水已流空。

sentences.english: Measurement methods for water in oil paper insulations were compared.
sentences.chinese: 比较了测量变压器内纸绝缘中水含量的各种方法。

sentences.english: By adding beneficial bacteria into reclaimed water, it will inhibit the growth of green algae.
sentences.chinese: 中水里添加有益菌对绿藻生长有抑制作用。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a water recycling device in families.
sentences.chinese: 一种家庭中水回收利用装置。

sentences.english: The body’s requirements for water vary, as it can depend largely on how much water is lost with normal daily activities.
sentences.chinese: 身体对水的需求量取决于日常活动中水的流失情况。

sentences.english: The higher the salinity, the less the water content in gas.
sentences.chinese: 地层水矿化度越高，气中水含量越低。

sentences.english: Insoluble dietary fiber was extracted from Ormund pomace by alkali dissolution.
sentences.chinese: 采用碱浸法提取薇菜中水不溶性膳食纤维。

definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
upper reaches (of a river)/to go upstream/to add some water/to water (a crop etc)
Qingshui (place name)/Shimizu (Japanese surname and place name)
to turn on the water/to let water out/to throw a game (sports)
